roleset.name: dispose of by deception

example.name: split phrasal
example.text: The department is advising residents to plant Sagos, if they must, in the back yard and telling nurseries to be on the lookout for anyone-1 trying [*]-1 to palm one off.

example.name: joined phrasal
example.text: That PASOK could win the elections outright is improbable; [the Greek press]-1, previously eager [*]-1 to palm off PASOK's line, has turned on Mr. Papandreou with a wild-eyed vengeance.

roleset.note: PALM_OFF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'palm_off' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from palm.01-v predicate notes)
